com.philips.platform.appinfra.servicediscovery

Class ServiceDiscoveryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.platform.appinfra.servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceDiscoveryInterface, java.io.Serializable

    public class ServiceDiscoveryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceDiscoveryInterface
    This class downloads list of URLs from service discovery server, providing the locale and the identity of the application.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getHomeCountry

        public java.lang.String getHomeCountry()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Fetches the Persistently stored Home country, the value is taken from the variable which has been set by setHomeCountry API. Changing the country automatically clears the cached service list and triggers a refresh.
        Specified by:
        getHomeCountry in interface ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Returns:
        Persistently stored Home country

      • setHomeCountry

        public void setHomeCountry(java.lang.String countryCode)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Persistently store Home country, overwrites any existing country value. Changing the country automatically clears the cached service list and triggers a refresh.
        Specified by:
        setHomeCountry in interface ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Parameters:
        countryCode - country code to persistently store, code must be according to ISO 3166-1

      • applyURLParameters

        public java.net.URL applyURLParameters(java.net.URL inputURL,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Replaces all '%key%' placeholders in the given URL, where the key is the key in the replacement table and the placeholder is replaced with the value of the entry in the replacement table
        Specified by:
        applyURLParameters in interface ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Parameters:
        inputURL - url in which to search for the key strings given by replacement
        parameters - mapping of placeholder string (key) to the replacement string (value)
        Returns:
        input url with all placeholders keys replaced with the respective value in the replacement table

      • refresh

        public void refresh(ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnRefreshListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Start negotiation with cloud service for the list of service for this application. List is based on sector, microsite, home country, and language. The retrieved list is cached internally (not persistently). The cached list is automatically refreshed every 24hours. A refresh is only required, to ensure the very first service request after app start can be processed from the cache quickly, or when a previous sync failed.
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Parameters:
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess when retrieval was successful; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.

      • refresh

        public void refresh(ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnRefreshListener listener,
                    boolean forceRefresh)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Start negotiation with cloud service for the list of service for this application. List is based on sector, microsite, home country, and language. The retrieved list is cached internally (not persistently). The cached list is automatically refreshed every 24hours. A refresh is only required, to ensure the very first service request after app start can be processed from the cache quickly, or when a previous sync failed.
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Parameters:
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess when retrieval was successful; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.
        forceRefresh - true or false
